This results into about 5975939 slices when you perform division operation but since it can’t possible result as fractions hence approximated value becomes equal to 5975939 .Similarly mark who got exactly  1\( \frac{1}{4}\) implies performing calculation ,i.e (\(\frac{5}{4}\)*8963908). Resultant output comes around 11204880 considering approximation values so only integer values without decimals thus making countable amounts thereby resulting approximate equals too high because such huge numbers aren't likely realistic even though theoretically accurate based upon provided mathematical logic.
